title: Lakshya Sen:There Is A New Champion On The Block! Shuttler Lakshya Sen Smashes His Way to Dutch Open Title
text:
There Is A New Champion On The Block! Shuttler Lakshya Sen Smashes His Way to Dutch Open Title

There Is A New Champion On The Block! Shuttler Lakshya Sen Smashes His Way to Dutch Open Title

India's promising young shuttler, Lakshya Sen, showed great determination and spirit to win his first career BWF title at the Dutch Open.

Getty Images

The 18-year-old beat Yusuke Onodera of Japan in the summit clash, but it was no plain sailing as he had come from a game down to defeat his world no. 160 opponent 15-21 21-14 21-15 in a final that lasted 63 minutes.

In the first set, Lakshya was taken by surprise as his Japanese opponent took the game to him and took an early lead. Indian rallied back to even make it 10-11, but coudn't quite muster a comeback.

Getty Images

Don't Miss 31.7 K SHARES 11.7 K SHARES 34 K SHARES 37.9 K SHARES

The second game started on a competitive note with the pair trying to outwit each other. The Indian grabbed a 8-5 lead at one stage but the Japanese clawed his way back.

Lakhsya again managed to move to 12-8 with four straight points. Onodera narrowed it down to 11-12 but Lakshya jumped to 18-11 and then roared back into the contest.

BAI

It came down to the deciding set, with Lakshya Sen showing great intensity and energy as he took a 9-4 lead early on. The Japanese Onodera tried to rally back, but Lakshya proved too strong as he took the final set 21-15.

It gave India's rising shuttler his first BWF title, and he would look to build on it for the future.
description: Indian promising young shuttler Lakshya Sen showed great determination and spirit to win the Dutch Open, his first career BWF title. The 18 year-old beat Yusuke Onodera of Japan in the summit clash, but it was no plain sailing as he had come from a game down to defeat his world no. 160 opponent 15-21 21-14 21-15 in a final that lasted 63 minutes.
